content: the brushland wrap proves tunisian crochet doesn t have to be intimidating this reversible triangle wrap uses basic tunisian skills to create a scarf that s light and flowy while still maintaining a serious cozy factor wear it with the traditional tunisian simple stitch side out for a richly woven look or flip it around for a cascade of modern stripes this pattern is easily modified to use yarn from your stash or to make a scarf of a different size the ad-free printable pdf includes a written pattern schematic photo tutorials and links to video tutorials the photos are separate from the written pattern so you can choose to print them or conserve ink if you ve always wanted to give tunisian crochet a try this satisfying pattern is a must make this pattern originally appeared on make & do crew see all our free modern crochet patterns here 1 1 www makeanddocrew com
